ygData.subject: The Cataloguing Libretto works, actually
ygData.msgSnippet: [snip] ... spell ... because ... [snip] This is not completely correct.  When you re singing the identify song, left-click an item to pick it up with the
ygData.messageBody:
[snip]
> However I KNOW song 14 doesn't work (the Catalogueing
> Libretto) because the song is basically the same thing as an Identify
spell
> (which also doesn't work). The reason identify magic doesn't work is
because
> all magic items in the game are already identified. Nothing is hidden. I
> personally hope that if they don't ever plan on hiding any magical
> properties on items that they either provide us with some lore on items
> using this song (a minor consolation to some, major to others as we are
> supposed to be lore masters), OR they replace the song with something
> useful.
[snip]

This is not completely correct. When you're singing the identify song,
left-click an item to "pick it up" with the mouse pointer. Don't put it
into an inventory slot, just leave it hanging under your mouse pointer. On
the next pulse, a bit of textual info about the item pops up in the chat
window. Unfortunately, it's nothing more than what you get from
right-click-and-holding on items, but it *does* work. It's just not at all
useful at this point :-)

--
Jamon, student of The Soerbaird
Plane of Solusek Ro
jamon@...
